name: Operation Bran Flakes
description: Focuses on inserting false information into the BPP's web pages to influence Branistan's election.

name: Operation Raisin Bran
description: A distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attack aimed at overwhelming the BPPâ€™s web servers.

name: APT BPP
description: An advanced persistent threat (APT) group characterized by its strategic approach and government-level resources.

name: Franistan Intelligence
description: Key figures in the threat operation, supporting leaders and employing techniques such as content spoofing and HTTP flood attacks.

name: Content Spoofing
description: A technique used by the threat actors to manipulate information on the BPP website.

name: HTTP Flood
description: A type of DDoS attack used in Operation Raisin Bran to overwhelm the BPP's web servers.
